title: Rename app to SUTRA and replace UI logo with provided Sutra logo

requirements.text: Rename all user-facing application naming from “Habitual” to “SUTRA”, including the browser tab title and the main header/welcome text in the UI.
acceptanceCriteria: The main header in `frontend/src/App.tsx` displays “SUTRA” instead of “Habitual”.
The logged-out welcome headline in `frontend/src/App.tsx` displays “Welcome to SUTRA” instead of “Welcome to Habitual”.

requirements.text: Create a new SUTRA logo image asset matching the uploaded reference logo (image.png) and use it in the app header in place of the current green gradient square + checkmark icon logo.
acceptanceCriteria: A new generated logo image exists under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` with the filename specified in image requirements.
`frontend/src/App.tsx` header displays the new logo image (not the lucide `Check` icon inside the green gradient block).
The logo is sized appropriately for the existing header layout (no overflow, no distortion; preserves aspect ratio).

requirements.text: Add a favicon derived from the SUTRA logo and update `frontend/index.html` to reference it so browser tabs show the SUTRA icon.

quotes: rename this app as SUTRA and make the logo as

acceptanceCriteria: A favicon image exists under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` with the filename specified in image requirements.
`frontend/index.html` includes a `<link rel="icon" ...>` pointing to the generated favicon file.
Reloading the app shows the SUTRA favicon in the browser tab.

constraints: Do not edit files under `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, or anything in `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose instead of modifying).
Keep backend logic in the single Motoko actor (`backend/main.mo`); no backend changes are required for rename/logo work.
nonGoals: Changing habit-tracking functionality, data models, or storage behavior.
Adding new authentication methods beyond Internet Identity.
Redesigning the full UI beyond what is necessary to update the app name and swap in the new logo/favicon.

required: SUTRA logo on white background, matching the uploaded reference mark with circular swoosh and upward arrow; no extra text (sutra-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Square favicon derived from the same SUTRA logo, centered with padding on transparent or white background (sutra-favicon.dim_32x32.png)
